question: Ahmed Bahri Nizarn Shah was succeeded by which of the following?
explanation: Ahmed Bahri Nizarn Shah was succeeded by his young son named Burhan Nizarn Shah I. Burhan Nizarn Shah I helped by his able commanders to protect the kingdom against the Imad Shahis of Berar and the Adil Shahis of Bijapur. The bone of contention was Sholapur.
